statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_compliance
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM plastic_waste_compliance
SELECT total_plastic_waste_kg FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE industry_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT industry_id, industry_name FROM plastic_waste_compliance ORDER BY industry_name DESC
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT industry_name, total_plastic_waste_kg FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE total_plastic_waste_kg > 1000 ORDER BY total_plastic_waste_kg DESC;
SELECT industry_name, total_plastic_waste_kg FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=true AND total_plastic_waste_kg < 5000;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=true ORDER BY industry_name ASC;
SELECT industry_name, total_plastic_waste_kg FROM plastic_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=false AND total_plastic_waste_kg < 2000;
SELECT * FROM industry_compliance;
SELECT industry_name, plastic_waste_managed FROM industry_compliance WHERE regulatory_status = true;
SELECT audit_id, industry_id, audit_date FROM audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT industry_name, plastic_waste_managed, regulatory_status FROM industry_compliance WHERE plastic_waste_managed > 100000;

SELECT industry_name, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM industry_compliance JOIN audit_records ON industry_compliance.industry_id = audit_records.industry_id GROUP BY industry_name ORDER BY total_audits DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry_compliance WHERE plastic_waste_managed > 1000 ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT industry_name, plastic_waste_managed FROM industry_compliance WHERE regulatory_status = TRUE;
SELECT industry_name, audit_score FROM industry_compliance JOIN audit_records ON industry_compliance.industry_id = audit_records.industry_id WHERE audit_score >= 80 ORDER BY audit_score DESC;
SELECT industry_name, plastic_waste_managed, regulatory_status FROM industry_compliance WHERE industry_name LIKE 'Tech%' AND plastic_waste_managed < 5000;

SELECT industry_name, regulatory_status FROM industry_compliance JOIN audit_records ON industry_compliance.industry_id = audit_records.industry_id WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IndustryCompliance;
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM IndustryCompliance WHERE plastic_waste_limit > 10;
SELECT regulatory_name FROM RegulatoryBody ORDER BY regulatory_name DESC;

SELECT industry_name, compliance_date FROM IndustryCompliance JOIN ComplianceRecords ON IndustryCompliance.industry_id = ComplianceRecords.industry_id WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT regulatory_name, compliance_result FROM ComplianceRecords JOIN RegulatoryBody ON ComplianceRecords.regulatory_id = RegulatoryBody.regulatory_id;
SELECT * FROM IndustryCompliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT industry_name, plastic_waste_limit FROM IndustryCompliance ORDER BY plastic_waste_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_result = 'Approved';
SELECT industry_name, compliance_date FROM IndustryCompliance INNER JOIN ComplianceRecords ON IndustryCompliance.industry_id = ComplianceRecords.industry_id;

SELECT regulatory_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM RegulatoryBody INNER JOIN ComplianceRecords ON RegulatoryBody.regulatory_id = ComplianceRecords.regulatory_id GROUP BY regulatory_name ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM industries;
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM industries ORDER BY industry_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste WHERE weight > 1000 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM plastic_waste WHERE industry_id = 2;
SELECT penalty_amount, penalty_reason FROM penalties WHERE penalty_amount > 500 ORDER BY penalty_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM industries;
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM industries ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY waste_type ASC;

SELECT i.industry_name, p.penalty_amount FROM industries i JOIN inspections ins ON i.industry_id = ins.industry_id JOIN penalties p ON ins.inspection_id = p.inspection_id WHERE p.penalty_amount > 500 ORDER BY p.penalty_amount DESC;

SELECT ins.inspector_name, i.industry_name, pw.weight FROM inspections ins JOIN plastic_waste pw ON ins.waste_id = pw.waste_id JOIN industries i ON pw.industry_id = i.industry_id WHERE ins.inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pw.weight DESC, ins.inspector_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM industry_regulations ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM industry_regulations WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT id, record_date FROM accountability_records WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_tracking WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT industry_name, compliance_status FROM industry_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM waste_management ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM accountability_records WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_tracking WHERE department = 'IT' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT log_date, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE action_taken LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
